name: Chicken Sandwich
description: A delicious sandwich featuring tender chicken breast, served on whole wheat bread with a creamy spread of mayonnaise and mustard.

name: Egg Sandwich
description: A classic breakfast option, this egg sandwich is made with fluffy eggs and served on white bread. It's perfect for starting your day off right.

name: Roast Beef Sandwich
description: Sink your teeth into this savory roast beef sandwich, featuring thinly sliced roast beef on sourdough bread, complemented with a rich spread of butter.

name: Grilled Cheese
description: Indulge in the gooey goodness of a grilled cheese sandwich made with melted cheese between slices of rye bread. Topped with Russian dressing and tangy sauerkraut for extra flavor.

name: Ham Sandwich
description: Savor the flavor of this ham sandwich, featuring thinly sliced ham wrapped in a soft tortilla wrap. Topped with zesty Caesar dressing and grated Parmesan cheese.

name: Nutella Sandwich
description: Treat yourself to a sweet sensation with this Nutella sandwich, featuring creamy Nutella spread on multigrain bread. Topped with a unique combination of mayonnaise, celery, and onion for added crunch and flavor.
